Articles.Content: I know there are multiple threads talking about modding radiators. But as far as I can find nobody actually released proper stockalike radiators. Anybody know where I can find some good ones?

The Heat Management mod has some that look very nice.

Someone had made a model that looked just like the ISS radiators but I have no idea what mod it went into.

Near Future is too big a pack. I'm already hitting the memory cap regularly due to leaks.

I guess I missed the other two threads yesterday. Heat Control looks like a very small pack. Going to give that one a try.

Thanks for the quick replies.
I've only tested Heat Control but consider this a instant hit thanks to it's heat pipes.

I just tested both. Heat Control is more intuitive as it is very simple and has only a few different. parts. Heat Management is more efficient with separate heat sinks and active cooling. My vote goes to Heat Management
the new Heat Management is the most Stock-alike right now I think.
